verblex: 1. To move over snow using skis. English = ski.
2. To move over water using water-skis. English = water-ski.
nomlex: 1. The sport in which you move on snow wearing long, flat, narrow pieces of wood, metal, or plastic that are fastened to boots. English = skiing.
2. The sport in which you ski on water while being pulled by a boat. English = water-skiing.
